I was awakeand they seemed to be in a big rush. There were two of themand they took me away.” - Author Lou BaldinIn League With A UFO © 1997by Lou Baldin. Out of print.Return to Part 1January 24, 2008 Albuquerque, New Mexico - Interview with author Lou Baldincontinued in this final segment after the Earthfiles.com reprint of his 1997 book, In LeagueWith A UFO.hat is it we are trying to discover about ourselves? There are many levelsof existence and there is the moving up and the moving down. We gain or loseenergy on simple every day actions – integrity being very important.It’s like you’ve got to get through the 1st, 2nd and 3rd grades to get to the 4thgrade. It’s not a shoot straight up. It’s not a word, it’s not a mantra thatanyone can have and that’s the absolute. You have to get to Point A or B and

then you can move on to C. There is a process.YOU COULD SAY THERE IS AN ABSOLUTE TRUTH IN THEUNIVERSE: RESPECT ALL LIFE. DO NOT KILL. THAT MIGHT BE ONEUNIVERSAL TRUTH.Universal truth is not available necessarily at this stage because there are a lotof universal truths down here. Like, ‘I was born in India and I have thisconcept of life and this is how I was raised. Therefore, this is my universaltruth.’ON THIS PLANET, RIGHT OR WRONG ACTIONS ARE DEPENDENTUPON CULTURE. SO, WHAT DID THE ENERGY FIELDSCOMMUNICATE TO YOU BEFORE YOUR BIRTH THAT WASIMPORTANT TO COMMUNICATE IN YOUR HUMAN LIFE THIS TIME?I think the really important thing is to know that there is a lot of stuff going onin our galaxy, that there is a lot of life. We have this planet Earth and we justassume that life started from pond scum and then we came from the ape. So, alot of people assume if there is a water on a planet, then certainly there is thepossibility of life on other planets around the galaxy - that the odds wouldfavor other life because of all the billions of different star systems.The reality is that nothing happened by accident. Everything was created.Everything was put here. Earth is just one cherry on a cherry tree withhundreds of cherries all over the galaxy. That’s the message. Things don’t justhappen. The cherry tree was planted and the cherry tree produced lots ofcherries. The cherries are pretty much the same. Earth is not unique andneither are humans. YOU SAID THAT AT AGE 12, AND BEFORE AND AFTER YOUR ARMYENLISTMENT, THAT SOMETHING NEGATIVE ENTERED YOUR LIFE?Some people would like to call it demons. But, there is a form of politicalsquabbling at certain levels. Just like you go to a school board, you havepeople there trying to decide what is the best curriculum and how to deliverthat curriculum.WHAT IS THE POLITICAL SQUABBLE ABOUT?The school board is probably a good analogy. How to best create the bestconditions to expand the mind and spirit. Do you do it with brutality, wars andpoverty? Or do you do it with a little bit of utopia?WHICH TYPE IS ARGUING ON WHAT SIDE?The energy beings I’m in contact with don’t think we need third worldconditions around the whole world. They seem to be more pro-technologyadvances.WHO IS ARGUING WITH THEM?That school board part of people who think that the more pain the moregain. PAIN VERSUS TECHNOLOGICAL EASE – A POLITICAL ARGUMENTABOUT WHAT TO DO WITH LIFE, HOW TO GUIDE IT, TOWARDWHAT END?

There is no end. As soon as you reach one peak, there is always a taller peakto climb.IN THIS SCHEMATIC THAT YOU HAVE DESCRIBED, WHICHPOLITICAL SIDE WOULD HAVE PLACED E = MC2 IN EINSTEIN’SMIND THAT LED TO THE ATOMIC BOMB?My side.IT IS TECHNOLOGICAL.Right, brought here and placed in our hands.BUT I CAN’T THINK OF A MORE DESTRUCTIVE PAINFUL OUTCOMETO LIFE THAN ATOMIC BOMBS.Absolutely.THEREFORE, IT’S SCHIZOPHRENIC.Exactly. Life is schizophrenic. We cannot comprehend. We are asking atoddler to understand what an algebra major is doing in college. It just cannotbe done.THEN WHY WOULD YOUR ENERGY BEINGS HAVE PRESENTEDEINSTEIN WITH THIS INSPIRED KNOWLEDGE THAT ENERGYEQUALS MASS TIMES THE SP EED OF LIGHT SQUARED? THEY MUSTHAVE KNOWN THE OUTCOME WOULD BE SOME HORRIBLEWEAPON IN HUMAN HANDS.There are two sides to every coin. That knowledge was very useful to advancethe human race. There are developmental stages for all planets like Earth. It’snot a simple thing to explain why we have to have pain other than there is awar going on and it’s not necessarily a human war. You’ve got the schoolboard, but you also have the thugs that are part of the mix.WHO ARE THE THUGS?The thugs are some of the entities that have been evicted off of this planet,but not all of them. They are a fluke of this whole process of spiritualdevelopment. Part of the free will thing, which gives each soul the ability tobecome more negative or more positive, more evil or more good. Withoutthose thugs, it does not work. It’s like fire. Fire can burn stuff up, but it alsocooks and heats.WHAT DO THE THUGS WANT?The thugs are kept alive by people who want to be thugs in the free will zone.WHAT WAS THE NEGATIVE INTERFERENCE IN YOUR YOUNG LIFE?I don’t know. I was being drawn to the dark side.IN WHAT WAY?The neighborhood I grew up in was a very tough neighborhood.IN KANSAS CITY, MISSOURI?Ye s .A lot of my friends ended up in jail. A lot of them have died doing certainthings. So, I was being drawn into that lifestyle.

OF CRIMINALITY?Right.SO WHAT HAPPENED? YOU WENT INTO THE ARMY TO ESCAPE IT?No, because when I came out of the Army, I was more vulnerable.HOW DID YOU GET INTO THE ARMY?I just joined.DID YOU JOIN BECAUSE YOU WERE TRYING TO ESCAPESOMETHING? OR YOU REALLY WANTED TO BE IN THE ARMY?I did live in poverty and I did want to escape that. I also wanted to get awayfrom some of the elements I was with. But I was intrigued by the military.BECAUSE?I just was for some reason. Maybe some of that evil pulled me in there.COULD IT BE SOMETHING THAT THE ENERGY FIELDS WANTED TOUNDERSTAND?No. I was being tested. DID THE ENERGY FIELDS SHOW UP IN ANY COUNTERBALANCINGWAY FROM AGE 12 UNTIL YOU GOT OUT OF THE ARMY?I’ve always had them around me – both sides.WERE YOU CONSCIOUS OF THE ENERGY FIELDS WHEN YOU FELTLIKE YOU WERE FALLING INTO A LIFE OF CRIMINALITY ANDGOING TO THE MILITARY AND BEING TRAINED HOW TO SHOOTPEOPLE? DID THAT ENERGY FIELD EXISTENCE EVER PENETRATEDURING THAT PERIOD OF TIME?Often.HOW?For some reason, it seems like I was put into situations where I was able tohelp certain people. Like in the military, I saved my commanding officer froman attack. And there were several other situations in which it seemed mypresence there negated a much worse outcome. I don’t know. Maybe theywere using me.WHEN YOU GOT OUTOF THE ARMY, WHY DID YOU FEEL LIKE YOUWERE MORE VULNERABLE TO CRIMINALITY?Because I went back to my old neighborhood and got back into the oldroutine. But similar situations occurred in which the end results were better.LIKE IN THE ARMY – THAT YOU WERE SAVING PEOPLE ORINTERVENING?Right.

WHAT WAS THE TRANSITION FROM CRIMINALITY TO ANON-CRIMINAL LIFE?It seemed like a finally entered a period that I was aware I was going to getmarried and have children. So, I went through a period where I completelychanged myself from drinking, smoking, partying to preparing myself for mychildren. This was even before I had children. I never even thought abouthaving children, but I came to a point where I knew things were going tochange. I was rudely interrupted. BY?By certain entities.BY WHICH TYPE?They were not very nice, so I’m not sure which side they were on. But afterthat, I did a major turnaround.WHAT DID THE ENTITIES LOOK LIKE?I never really saw what they looked like. But they took me and were on melike a pack of wild wolves.YOU MEAN IN YOUR BED, YOU WERE ATTACKED?No, they took me into a ship.WHAT DO YOU MEAN, ‘ATTACKED’?It’s the best I can describe it. Very in my face, almost ripping at me.OVER WHAT?Over my way of life. It was an ultimatum like we try to quit smoking or go ondiets, which never work. But it was a done deal that night. There was no ‘I’lltry to do better.’ It was a very traumatic encounter, cold turkey. One day Iwas this person. The next day, I was almost a completely different person.SO THEY MIGHT HAVE BEEN EMISSARIES FROM THE ENERGYFIELDS?I’m sure they were.BECAUSE YOUR ENERGY FIELD WAS GETTING OFF TRACK FROMWHAT IT WAS SUP P OSED TO DO?That’s what I’m thinking.TODAY AS WE SPEAK ON DECEMBER 23, 2007, THE WHOLEPLANET IS WORRIED ABOUT WHAT IS GOING TO HAPPEN IN 2008TO 2012. GLOBAL WARMING IS SETTING IN WITH BOTH DISASTERIN SOME PLACES AND PERHAPS NON-DISASTER IN OTHERS.PEOPLE ARE VERY CONCERNED ABOUT ASTRONOMICAL EVENTSTHAT COULD COME AND WIPE OUT LIFE ON THE SURFACE OF THEEARTH. DO YOU FEEL THAT IN THE NEXT FIVE YEARS OR SO THATSOMETHING OF AN ASTRONOMICAL NATURE IS GOING TO IMPACTTHE EARTH?

No. A lot of things that are going to happen, but nothing astronomical.Nothing is going to wipe out all life on this planet. It will be a lot of more ofthe same: we are becoming a smaller planet and we are rubbing elbows withmore friction than in the past as countries expand. So, we are going to haveturbulence, but we’re not going to enter a ‘New Age,’ other than what we doevery year. We become a little bit more aware of things around us on thisplanet.2012 is just going to be another year with its ups and downs. Aliens are notgoing to come down here and make themselves known.WHY NOT?Because there is no point in their making themselves known. It would disruptthe schoolyard. BUT THEY ARE REPORTED IN THE SKIES, ON THE GROUND, IN THEWATERS AROUND THE WORLD!And they always have been. They’ve always been here and been called otherthings, but now we’re calling them aliens and reptilians and greys. I neverclearly remember what the beings look like, except I do remember thereptilians. Those reptilians I have seen actually seem to have more light thansome other beings.WHAT AGE WAS YOUR FIRST ENCOUNTER WITH THE REPTILIANSAND WHAT DID THEY LOOK LIKE?The reptilians I encountered, when it became very plain to me was only acouple of years ago in 2005.THE SKIN IS BUMPY?I wouldn’t say bumpy, but for some reason you could tell the texture wasscaly. I didn’t touch them.A FINER KIND OF SCALES THAN A CROCODILE?Yes, that’s probably so.SNAKE SKIN IS OFTEN VARIED IN COLORS AND SHADES. IS THATWHAT YOU MEAN THAT YOU ARE LOOKING AT DIFFERENTCOLORS?Kind of a green-bluish shade.HOW DID THE REPTILIANS COME INTO YOUR LIFE TWO YEARSAGO?They just showed up.IN YOUR BEDROOM?I had just turned the lights off and jumped into bed and they came just beforeI fell asleep.HOW DID THEY COME?The reptilians just came right through the wall. I was awake and they seemed

to be in a big rush. There were two of them and they took me away.The reptilians moved rapidly around each other and then when they took me,I was moving with them. I was elevated to their speed after they touched meand I was one with them. They just raced off and we went into what I thinkwas a ship.WHAT DO THOSE INTELLIGENCES WANT?What do all these beings want? There are a lot of beings out there and thereare a lot of agendas to go with them. That is why I wrote another book I haven't published yet that I call, A Day with An Extraterrestrial.” Earthfiles.com will learn more about A Day with An Extraterrestrial from author LouBaldin in 2008 after his second book is published.More Information:or further reports about extraterrestrial biological entities and technologies, please seemy books, An Alien Harvest and the 2-volume Glimpses of Other Realities in theEarthfiles Shop.
